title: Implementation of Anamaduwa Integrated Water Supply Project
decision_details: - the proposed Anamaduwa Integrated Water Supply Project will provide safe drinking water to a population of about 81,700 in the Puttalam District. The project  includes the construction of a new intake at Inginimitiya Reservoir, a fully equipped water treatment plant inclusive of water towers, laying of 62 km long water transmission mains and  328 km long distribution system and other related works. The proposal made by Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena, Minister of Water Supply and Drainage, to proceed with the activities relating to the award of the contract, was approved by the Cabinet.
